Description: Lip sherd of Attic, probably black-figured, pottery band cup; slightly concave lip, sharply offset inside; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: lip glazed; reserved handle zone with trace of black design below; two ancient repair holes.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.2.8)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1400)
